metadata.name: TeamViewer Remote Session
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of log files during a TeamViewer remote session

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\teamviewer\\remoteprinting\\tvprint.db')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\teamviewer\\tvnetwork.log')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\teamviewer')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('_logfile.log'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of log files during a TeamViewer remote session

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate uses of TeamViewer in an organisation Reference: https://www.teamviewer.com/en-us/
